discussion.content:
B. Add the Manual Sharing button the page layout.

To enable the sales rep to give record access to a colleague, the administrator could add the Manual Sharing button to the page layout. This would allow the sales rep to share the Account and related records with the colleague while they are on vacation.

Ownership-based sharing rules, including public groups for sharing, are used to automatically grant record access based on specific criteria. However, these rules do not give the sales rep the ability to manually grant access to specific records.

Including the rep on the Opportunity Team could grant the rep access to Opportunity records, but it does not automatically grant access to Account records.

Therefore, the best option would be to add the Manual Sharing button to the page layout, which would allow the sales rep to grant access to specific records to their colleague while they are away.

choices.C: Include the rep on the Opportunity Team.

B. Owner adjustments and D. Manager adjustments should be enabled to meet this requirement.

Owner adjustments allow sales reps to adjust their own forecast amounts, which is useful for keeping their forecasts up to date based on changes in their pipeline.

Manager adjustments allow managers to adjust the forecast amounts for their subordinates, giving them the ability to make corrections or adjustments to any inaccuracies that may arise.

Revenue adjustments and payout adjustments are not relevant to this requirement.
